title: Santos Dumont Explaining His Air Ship To The Hon. C. S. Rolls

sources.title: Santos Dumont Explaining His Air Ship To The Hon. C. S. Rolls
sources.description: Santos Dumont Explaining His Air Ship to the Hon. C.S. Rolls is a short film made using a sequence of frames that shows the inventor Santos Dumont explaining the operation of his airship balloon to Charles Rolls , the future founder of Rolls-Royce. The short film was filmed in London and screened on December 3 , 1901 at the Palace Theater.
